data.name: new OLX
data.description:
Updated styles for new OLX.

Changed black to light colors, buttons is blue, prices is orange.
Fixed hover effects in many elements (categories, buttons, lists, links).
Changed font to Open Sans
Colorized logo (old style)

data.name: 9Anime Minimal
data.description: For 9Anime, Minimalist, Modern and Clean, emphasis on the art and clarity.

data.name: Beuth Hochschule Belegsystem Reworked
data.description:
Das Belegsystem ist ja bekannt dafür dass es schlecht designt ist. 
Dieser userstyle versucht so viel wie möglich aus dem kaputten und veralteten HTML zu holen.
Endlich Responsive Design! Widescreen Support! Klarere Knöpfe!

data.name: Time.is Dark
data.description: A Dark theme for the Time.is website

data.name: Superstart, a modern style
data.description:
Modernized the blocks with a cleaner look.

The blocks now stick out and distinguish them selfs without a border through the added shadow.

data.name: 轻之国度 LK 深度阅读（夜间版）
data.description: 应用于 lightnovel.cn 的、用深灰色背景及大号白色字体来模仿夜间低亮度阅读的、排除了其他网页物件的深度阅读模式（夜间版）！使用前请在小说页选择“只看楼主”哦！

data.name: 轻之国度 LK 深度阅读（日间版）
data.description: 应用于 lightnovel.cn 的、用棕黄色背景及大号字体来模仿纸质阅读的、排除了其他网页物件的深度阅读模式（日间版），使用前请在小说页选择“只看楼主”哦！

data.name: Dziennik Dark
100 lat planowania
WhatsApp Sublime Theme
data.description: A modern theme for WhatsApp which covers most features which is inspired from Sublime Text 3 color scheme. This theme provides a clean and modern experience in WhatsApp which generally makes the UI look more slick and better.
